mapper.select: select id as id, project_id as projectId, csa_code as csaCode, management_rate as managementRate, change_amount as changeAmount, trice as trice, create_time as createTime, create_user as createUser, update_time as updateTime, update_user as updateUser, description as description, version as version, status as status from t_contract_change where project_id=#{projectId} order by trice desc
